title: Fantasy Esports is Recruiting! (Serious ranked team)
body:
Fantasy Esports is Recruiting. 

What will your time on Fantasy Esports consist of -  
1. Two training sessions a week. (roughly 2-3 hours long) 
2. 2-5 Ranked 5v5 games a week
3. Weekly tournaments. (Oce weekly) 

If you would kindly answer these questions. i'll add you in game and we can go from there

1.  IGN ? 
2.  Role
3.  Top 3 picks
4.  Availability
5.  Sub or Starter

looking for Plat 2 and up mainly

replies.body:
IGN: Hi im mozart
Role: ADC/MID/Support
Top 3 Picks: Graves, Draven, Corki (can play any adc well) 
Availability: Weekdays after 6, saturday after 2:30, sunday all day
Sub or Starter: Dont mind at all, would just love to be a part of the team!

IGN: Amaran Elis
Role: Support/Top/ADC
Top 3 picks: Leona, Thresh, Janna 
Availability: Weekends all day, weekdays after 7.
Sub or starter: Would like to start, but can play as sub

IGN: Lexhanatin
Role: Mid/Adc/Jungle
Top 3 picks: LeBlanc, Annie, Fizz/Jinx, Caitlyn, Tristana/J4, Warwick
Availability: Everyday (Monday and Wednesday: After 5 PM AEST,  Tuesday: After 2 PM AEST)
Sub or Starter: Starter

How serious are we talking here?

IGN: Joshified
Role: Top
Top 3 Picks: Irelia/Rumble/Sion
Availability: Everyday after 7pm. (I am in the process of moving so these times might vary a little for the next week or two)
Starter.

Diamond 5 atm.
I'm looking for members who are wanting to get this team into the challenger series.

IGN: Maximil Pegasus
Role: Top Mid
Top 3 Picks: Mid Xerath Orianna Lissandra, Top Aatrox Gnar Rumble
Availbaility: Nearly 24/7. I work and go to uni as well
Starter

i have a larger champ pool, but i adapt to the meta as much as i can. i can also off meta.

i have a larger champ pool, but i adapt to the meta as much as i can. i can also off meta.

Availability: Weekdays after 6 Vic times, Weekends at any time.
Starter

I can play all ADCs competently, but those are my favourite 3 :)

Top 3 picks:Oriana,kayle,Syndra 
Everyday weekday after 5, weekends 90% of the time
Starter

Starter.

I can play all supports but if there are a specific set that are more beneficial to be played in team comps I can practice those more in solo Q to benefit R5's. Im also wondering how serious are you talking about?

1.IGN Mar3thyu
